Package controller

Class CalendarController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CalendarController
  • public class CalendarController
extends java.lang.Object
    A control class that will handle methods relating to the calendar model. It allows staff to initialize the Calendar object and modify weekend/holidaydates.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Wai Leong, Oh Jun Teng, Edhie Wahidin Michelle, Myat Hmu Khin
    See Also:
    Calendar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Calendar calendar
      Initialization of Calendar object that contains all special dates that affect price.

      CalendarController()

        public static Calendar calendar

    • Method Detail

      • configureDates

        public static void configureDates​(int selection,
                                  java.lang.String date,
                                  Calendar c)
        Parameters:
        selection - Choice of what kind of date to add. "0" for holiday date, "1" for weekend date.
        date - date to be added to the calendar. Should be in String format YYYYMMDD.
        c - Calendar object date is to be added to.

      • createCalendar

        public static Calendar createCalendar()
        Creates special dates that have special prices. Ie. holday dates and weekend dates.
        Returns:
        calendar object
